<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
InvalidBlank occurs when a blank identifier is used as a value or type.

Per the spec:
 "The blank identifier may appear as an operand only on the left-hand side
 of an assignment."

Example:
 var x = _
```
